definitions.definition: A thick, sweet syrup drained from sugarcane , especially ( Canada , US ) the still thicker and sweeter syrup produced by boiling down raw molasses.
( US ) Any similarly thick and sweet syrup produced by boiling down fruit juices, tree saps , etc., especially concentrated maple syrup .
( figuratively ) Anything considered figuratively sweet , especially sweet words.
examples: He really poured on the molasses , charming his audience and changing more than a few votes.

definitions.definition: ( figuratively ) Something which moves or works extremely slowly .
( Scotland , obsolete ) plural of molass : whiskey made from molasses.
( Scotland , rare , obsolete ) Synonym of molass : whiskey made from molasses.
